metadata.title: CVE-2020-26088 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A missing CAP_NET_RAW check in NFC socket creation in net/nfc/rawsock.c inthe Linux kernel before 5.8.2 could be used by local attackers to createraw sockets, bypassing security mechanisms, aka CID-26896f01467a.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-121-generic - 4.15.0-121.123
